website_summaries.verdict: This mid-grade tamper is calibrated for 30 lb. of pressure. It doesn't always hit the mark, but it stays within the recommended range and is budget-friendly.
pros: Calibrated espresso tamper with 58mm puck designed to fit professional espresso machines
Comfortable, easy to use, and doesn't stress the hand
cons: Tamper may not be calibrated to exactly 30 lb., but it runs between 20-50 lb., which is the recommended range for espresso

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend. PS
customer_reviews.text: The tamp includes engraving of the LuxHaus brand name on the side, this can interfere with tamping, and in turn result in channeling of espresso. I cannot recommend. PS: LuxHaus was kind enough to send me a replacement tamper because the first one delivered had scratches in the metal. I appreciate their great customer service, but the issue I described above is a real problem that cannot be avoided - and is an unrelated issue to the scratch problem which LuxHaus graciously solved. If LuxHaus ever decides to make a new run without the engraved logo on the side and improved calibration of the tamp, then I would reconsider.
customer_reviews.author: S. McLoughlin

customer_reviews.title: I guess it is not easy to get 30-35 pound of pressure unless you doing ...
customer_reviews.text: This tamper allowed me to extract the ultimate naked shot after 2 grinding adjustment. I had hard time to do the same using the ordinary tamper. I guess it is not easy to get 30-35 pound of pressure unless you doing it routinely. I got now the confidence to do it with this tamper. I blame myself why I did not buy it long time age. Those experts always advise against it because of their ego complexes. Calibrated tamper is the answer for ordinary people who like to grind their own shots provided the have a good grinder and a good machine.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this to replace the stock tamper that came with my Breville Barista Express. For the first time, I feel good about the consistency of the tamp. Made 3 doubles this morning and they all were consistent in the pour, just as I had hoped. Tamper feels solid and quality seems really good. Well worth the low cost in comparison to the other ~$100 calibrated tampers.
customer_reviews.author: gs32

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Keeps you consistent. Perfectly flat. Made me realize how much I was over tamping previously. Also made my realize my other tamper was not perfectly flat. Needed to grind finer once I got this tamper. Once my grind was dialed in I have been getting really good consistent shots from my machine. Highly recommended. Should also note that my item was lost when initially shipped to me. Seller quickly resolved this issue and sent me a replacement item at not extra cost. Seller - Luxhaus - gets 5 stars as well.
customer_reviews.author: jared c wolfe

customer_reviews.title: My didn’t a buy this sooner?
customer_reviews.text: I now look forward to my morning espresso. this is a must have if you are struggling with staying consistent with your shots... plus my husband (finally) learned how to pull an espresso shot........ amazing. The only con is that it came with a really cute card saying that the lovey couple makes these in their garage.. yet the tamper says it’s made in China? But I didn’t deduct any stars because I only care about how well this works and if it has made my day to day life any easier. Will update if my opinion changes!
customer_reviews.author: Gabricole M

customer_reviews.title: This thing is amazing - such build quality!
customer_reviews.text: The first thing that struck me was the weight - this is a hefty device! I was blown away by how sturdy and solid this tamper is. Despite the weight, it is very easy to handle and way more ergonomic than my previous tampers. It's very comfortable and immediately became my favorite. The build in calibration takes the guess work out of getting that 30 pounds of pressure. I can't say enough about this tamper. I've used it about 4-6 times a day for the last several weeks and can't see any reason to use something else. Quality build, comfortable, easy to use and super effective. Couldn't ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: Garth Ellelfson

customer_reviews.title: Product  exceeds my expectations , impressive quality!
customer_reviews.text: Wow ! You can see and feel the quality of this product ! I recently started learning about how to make my own espresso with my own manual espresso machine. I was getting a 15 second Pull using the supplied plastic tamper. I changed nothing in the process except for this calibrated Tamper and behold, the Pull time is now 25 seconds... the resulting taste of the shot is awesome! I'm more than pleased with this Tamper! I can't believe it's made in a garage!!! Keep up the good work, Very,Very Impressive !!! Money well spent!!! Thanks, Jim
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Very good Tamper
customer_reviews.text: I am an apprentice for making espresso coffee and I decided to choose this tamper. It was not easy to get the best coffee the firsts time, but now I am happy I get it. I think it was a very good decision. I'm happy with the tamper and the brand. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: It works, just not as accurately
customer_reviews.text: The weight is nice, but the spring pressure is much too high. Used multiple scales (digital, analog) to test pressure. All showed over 40lbs. Definitely give points for a comfortable handle against the palm and nice flare around base to push tamper down. The pressure made me posted on this. But, if you're just learning the basics of espresso at home or cafe, the spring pressure may help you.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Lehner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Breville Barista Touch
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for Breville Barista Touch portafilter - it is the same, exact diameter as the original Breville tamper. I ordered this to help out my consistency during tamps and after using it a few times, I am very glad I did. It is very solidly built with a nice heavy feel. The plunger works great and makes consistent, level tamps a breeze. Price is very reasonable too.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkeye

customer_reviews.title: Nice to Use, Consistent Results
customer_reviews.text: Nice finish on all surfaces, good heft and comfortable to use. I appreciate the spring loaded travel of the press; it allows me to get far more consistent results than I got with the built in "press" attached to my Delonghi Espresso maker. You will see other reviews that speak in long form on issues with proper calibration of the spring action or issue with the internal works of the spring mechanism. I've had no such concerns after a few months of use. Again, its nice to use and I get consistent results. Given the price I suggest you simply give it a try, I suspect 9 out of 10 will be happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easiest Way to up your Espresso Game
customer_reviews.text: I currently have an inexpensive DeLonghi Espresso machine and even though we were getting ok results with the built in tamper sometimes we would over or under pack the puck and I wanted more consistent results. This product does exactly that. My pucks are consistently more even which has led to a more consistent, even pull and perfect crema almost every time. Usually if something goes wrong with a pull it's because I messed up and overfilled the portafilter, or didn't verify that the puck was even. Overall, I would say this is a cheap and easy way to make a big impact in the quality of your espresso.
customer_reviews.author: Christi Dickson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The fit and finish is impeccable. Comes in a fitted case with a red velvet like cinch sack. But that is not what fully impressed me about this tamper. It was the customer service. I actually measured and ordered the wrong size. I messaged the vendor and received an answer the next day. Replaced the tamper for free and asked me to pass along the wrong sized to someone else who could use it. This is what customer service should be like.
customer_reviews.author: f1fan1972

customer_reviews.title: Not bad!
customer_reviews.text: Tamper feels high quality and it has some weight to it. I'm not sure if it is actually calibrated to 30lbs or not, but honestly I don't care. It definitely has helped me be consistent with my tamping pressure, and that is really good. I wish it actually clicked, but it's okay like it is. Only reason I'm giving it 4/5 stars is that for the money, I expected it to arrive in perfect condition, but it was scratched. I messaged the company on facebook but they have yet to reply.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: The best pruchase possible for upping your espresso game
customer_reviews.text: As someone who's new to the espresso bobby (obsession really), this has been one of the best purchases I've made since getting my Breville Espresso maker. This lets me get a consistent tamp every time. That in turns gives me very exact extraction rate, which means the shots are consistently good.
customer_reviews.author: Thanatos

customer_reviews.title: great espresso tamper!  pull awesome shots consistently.
customer_reviews.text: works great. allows you to pull consistent shots (or dial them in) by keeping tamp pressure the same. that way you can play with grind size, dose (amount of coffee), etc. fits very nicely in the breville portafilter. i have not scaled the pressure it takes to bottom out, but that is less important than a consistent tamp every time. also helps folks who are newer to the espresso game.
customer_reviews.author: Matt H.

customer_reviews.title: OMG what a difference 😃
customer_reviews.text: I’m honestly thrilled. I didn’t think it would make that much of a difference , was I ever wrong.. I used it for the first time this morning and finally got a great cup of coffee.. i was useing the light cheaper one that came with my machine and it wasn’t compacting the coffee.. great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: Bought the 58mm tamper for my new machine. Box labeled 58, tamper measures closer to 52mm. It fits inside my old Breville 54mm baskets.... Contacted amazon got them to send another one. Same issue this one maybe measures 53mm but still not anywhere close to 58. Terrible quality control. Sending the 2nd one back and ordering another brand. Not worth my time. Also the first one I measured the spring and it appeared to be around 45 lbs instead of 30.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: One Year Review- I like it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased back in June 2018, so I've been using it now for a little over a year with my Breville Oracle Touch. Yes, the Breville OT has a built in grinder/tamper, but to take it to the next level you really need to weigh out your dose and keep it consistent. Anyway...that's topic for a separate review, but this tamper fits the portafilter perfectly and gives you that repeatable tamp pressure to take that variable out of the equation. So now you can play around with dosing and grind levels. Would definitely purchase again and recommend.
customer_reviews.author: RevJVegas

customer_reviews.title: Invaluable tool that looks good, works great, packaged nicely.
customer_reviews.text: Works great, especially for someone who tends to overdo things. It allows me a single press without feeling the need to spin, polish or otherwise have a chance to disturb the freshly tamped coffee bed. The (58mm) tamper itself weighs about 450 grams and it seems to press/tamp at around 35 pounds on an old bathroom scale consistently. Another pleasant surprize was It also seems to encourage a level coffee bed, something I've always struggled with that's not been an issue since I started using this.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made and designed
customer_reviews.text: This tamper was EXACTLY what I was looking for. It matched my espresso machine precisely (it took a LITTLE digging to find the best fit for my brand/model.) It's very solid and came in a very attractive package! While not necessary, it gave a little touch of class that is fun. Shipping was prompt and actually arrived a day sooner than expected. The handle is solid and easy to grip, and the base has a good heaviness to it. Extremely well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey R. Engholm

customer_reviews.title: Great tamper!
customer_reviews.text: Get a perfect tamp everytime! My wife did not realize she was not tamping hard enough and I was probably over tamping. So this calibrated tamper works great! I measured it and it is calibrated for 30lbs. Used a bathroom scale to get a number of readings and it was very consistent.
customer_reviews.author: Xxzzy

customer_reviews.title: BEST Coffee Tamper EVER
customer_reviews.text: If you have an espresso machine and enjoy a good cup of coffee you definitely need this Pressure Tamper. It gives you a perfect expresso taste because the compression is uniform. The base of the Tamper doesn’t move : you just push the handle down. It is well made and ergonomic. It came in a nice box with his little velvet pouch. It seems a little expensive but so worth it ! I definitely recommend this elegant high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Momzy

customer_reviews.title: I am not fully convinced that the calibrated value is the best value and how to recalibrate it over time (which ...
customer_reviews.text: When you are dealing with multiple variables it is very helpful to set one variable to a constant. Tamping is the one area where there is a lot of operator variability - so using a calibrated tamper mostly removes that variability. I am not fully convinced that the calibrated value is the best value and how to recalibrate it over time (which is necessary for any 'precision' instrument), but for the last few weeks since I have been using it, I have been pulling excellent shots. The tamper also helps in dialing in the grind for different coffee beans since the tamping variability is removed. (And also do yourself a favor and get a naked portafilter...)
customer_reviews.author: L. Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Huge Improvement for 870XL Users
customer_reviews.text: Came from the tamper that came with my Barista Express to this. Huge improvement in tamping quality. The Luxhaus weighs almost literally 5 times as much as the one that comes with the 870 (408g vs 82g). It fits the portafilter basket at a much tighter tolerance too. Would recommend to anyone looking at the 53mm.
customer_reviews.author: Sigmonster

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful and well made product.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I ordered the wrong size, because I clicked the wrong button. But I'm exchanging it today, one day after receiving the tamper. It is packaged in a wonderful gift/storage box, and is very impressive in appearance and careful construction. I'm anxious to get the replacement so I can start using it.
customer_reviews.author: CaptBuddy

customer_reviews.title: Solid, high quality tamper
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this tamper and glad I invested in it. What a difference it makes to the quality and consistency of my espressos. I love that it indicates when I've hit around 30 pounds of pressure, makes it so easy. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is that the top of the handle is rounded. I suppose most, if not all, tampers are like that. As as result it hurts my palm, but I can live with it. I'd like to see a handle that is flat and wide on top, but it's not a deal breaker.
customer_reviews.author: IJ Woods

customer_reviews.title: Pulling my most conistent shots ever.
customer_reviews.text: Getting tamping consistent and even has been a struggle for me since getting into espresso. Using this calibrated tamper alongside a leveling tool and bottomless portafilter has helped me remove one more variable in the huge matrix of things to tune and diagnose in working towards that perfect shot of espresso. Just today pulled probably my most drinkable raw espresso shot ever, now that I finally have a handle on all of the tuning knobs individually without inconsistencies.
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: This ups your espresso game!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this with my Breville infuser for almost 8 months now and love it! The tamp that comes with the machine is a cheap plastic joke. I never would have known how hard to tamp if not for the clicking function on this piece.
customer_reviews.author: D. Productions

customer_reviews.title: Should be renamed Perfect Puck
customer_reviews.text: I bought and have been using the Lux tamper for a few weeks. I am an experienced home "barista" and have been using the Breville Barista Express for the past few months. Since using the Lux tamper every puck is perfect, no more guesswork. Much better than before I started using the Lux. Now the only variables are weight (use a scale) and grind size (you have to adjust as needed depending on the beans you use). Very happy with the purchase and well worth it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dental love

customer_reviews.title: Would make a wonderful gift
customer_reviews.text: Beats the plastic tamper that came with my espresso machine. Takes a bit to press down, but that’s what you want. Wood handle is large and fits nicely in my hand. Would make a lovely gift. Comes boxed with a fabric bag for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Great Tamper!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for our Breville infuser with 54mm portafilter and it works like a charm. Very sturdy and solid, feels like a pro tamper design. I’ve been getting a lot more consistent shot. 2 thumbs UP!!!
customer_reviews.author: ardi wijaya

customer_reviews.title: Makes all the difference to my espresso flavor coming through...
customer_reviews.text: I never pressed down my espresso downs into my stovetop espresso cooker and my Americano always tasted bland and watery....now it has flavor. Using this tamper is easy and makes all the difference to my morning fix.
customer_reviews.author: SARA-JO

customer_reviews.title: Solid Tamper and a Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Quality item, from the heft of the tamper to the the overall finish to the sealed spring mechanism, I was very impressed with it from my first use. The packaging is also impressive and top-shelf. Unit does not provide the "idiot proof" click of some of the other tampers on the market costing three times as much, but rather gives the user more control over the tamping process by using sensory feedback from the positive stop. Highly recommend. Thank you, Stefan, for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Tee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and service.
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my 58 mm espresso tamper. I am a barista and wanted a tamper for my home espresso machine. The quality of this one is on par with the ones I use at the cafe. Great price and wonderful customer service!! Highly recommend this product and company.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Solid and Smooth
customer_reviews.text: It is pretty hefty, wasn't expecting it really. The mechanism is very smooth and helped me make the best tasting shots that have ever come from my machine. It takes a lot guesswork out of the process which results in a fine beverage. Also A great gift for all coffee lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Thor

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I have a coffee shop in Virginia Beach Lynnhaven coffee Company and we have been using these to train our employees. they work very well and easy to get use too. The pressure is just right for the perfect espresso. I would recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: jnash

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tamp with case but not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: After using this for a while now the tamp is of great quality but does not seem calibrated correctly. When using the tamp and pressing it until the tamp is all the way down my espresso shot comes out really slowly. When I use my other tamp it comes out beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Johnny O

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: if you are into top of the line products, no need to look at any others, this tamper is super sturdy, and very well made, the box it comes in is nicer than most tampers..
customer_reviews.author: BISCUIT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent automatic tamper.
customer_reviews.text: Pricey but very high quality. My shots have greatly improved. Would absolutely purchase again. Calibrated for about 25lbs. Take out one less variable. Be sure to order the correct diameter!
customer_reviews.author: Gary J. Allsebrook

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This tamper works great because it automatically applies the correct pressure. It arrived quickly and in great condition. The seller followed up to make sure I was satisfied, which is a plus. BTW, I am very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: cmoore

customer_reviews.title: Consistent tamping pressure
customer_reviews.text: This tamper provided a consistent pressure for tamping expresso. I then can calibrate everything else around the tamping pressure (e.g. expresso grind ) to pull a great shot of expresso.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: It Works.
customer_reviews.text: I initially did not think this tamper would make a difference. I thought it was just "hype" or a gimmick. But I decided to take the leap. I was pleasantly surprised. So far I have made about 10 cups of espresso and all had really nice crema on top. The calibrated tamper ensures consistent pressure. So now with that figured out, I've got my grind dialed in and my favorite coffee bean - perfection every morning. If you are on the fence like I was, go for it.
customer_reviews.author: K J.

customer_reviews.title: Nice tamper from LuxHaus. Absolutely great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The tamper is just what I needed and works well to get a consistent tamp. Best of all is the customer service. The tamper arrived quickly but it was the wrong size. A quick email to LuxHaus and I received the correct size in record time. Stefan even said don't worry about sending back the wrong one. I'd do business again with LuxHaus in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Travlos

customer_reviews.title: Nice fancy tamper
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a birthday gift for my boyfriend to use with his espresso machine... major upgrade from the plastic one he was using! He really likes it, although it is a bit difficult to get pressed all the way down.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Kate

customer_reviews.title: Makes a difference
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very well-made and sturdy. It actually made a difference in the brewing process. My espresso machine (Breville XL870) reaches the correct pressure during both pre-infusion and actual brewing; when I was using the stock tamper and could only guess how much force I needed to apply, the pressure gauge during pre-infusion was pretty much at 0. The difference in taste is not huge, but it's there!
customer_reviews.author: George R.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! I specifically looked for a heavy tamper and I am pleased. It seems to be calibrated correctly. Good quality, easy to handke and clean. Would be a great gift for a barista!
customer_reviews.author: Jewels

customer_reviews.title: Great tamper to go with our Breville Barista Express espresso machine
customer_reviews.text: This tamper takes the guesswork out of getting a consistent cup of espresso or any espresso based drink. Glad we bought it and would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Aesir

customer_reviews.title: Very nice but high priced
customer_reviews.text: This product is very well built. It seems to be made with quality workmanship and materials. I was new to the whole espresso making and wasn't sure how important or necessary a tamper was. I don't regret the purchase but knowing what I know now i would not have gone so fancy. I am single person who rarely ever has guests over. Could have gotten by with something less expensive. I also never received the batista book that was part of the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using it constantly since I first bought it and before having it, I couldn’t press the coffee good enough. This year, my son told me that’s what he wanted for Xmas. It comes neatly packaged and the manual is really interesting to read.
customer_reviews.author: firstreviewing

customer_reviews.title: Really great product
customer_reviews.text: For someone who really appreciates great espresso, but isn't a professional this small tool really helps you to get consistent results. I would recommend it to any barista or at home espresso lover.
customer_reviews.author: Technical Support

customer_reviews.title: Great tamp.  Very well made.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this tamp for 3 months, and it is working beautifully. The shape and larger size make it much more comfortable to use than most, and the calibration truly helps with quality control. Highly recommend this product - especially if you have ever dealt with hand/wrist pain during barista shifts.
customer_reviews.author: M.danceLA

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for over a month, now. The fit for the Brevelle (54 mm) is almost perfect. Unlike the provided tamper the LuxHaus gives a consistent pull. While I have no idea what measured tamping pressure I’m achieving, crema has improved as well as flavor. I like the heft of the tamper, not plastic. Looks good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Bozler

customer_reviews.title: Very nice tamper
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tamper, high quality build and precise diameter. I measured the spring on a scale and it takes about 29lbs of pressure for it to make contact with the stop point, and the unit itself weighs 1 lb. Voila, 30lbs of pressure. I would say it's calibrated accurately. Would recommend especially for a beginning barista.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremiah Molinaro

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for a newb to espresso
customer_reviews.text: A perfect tamp every time, very easy to use especially for a newb to espresso, couldn't recommend this any more than I do
customer_reviews.author: christopher kretzschmar

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This was on my niece's Christmas list. It works so much better than the one she had. She's very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Rintac

customer_reviews.title: Makes tampering MUCH easier, high quality product.
customer_reviews.text: We are SO happy with our LuxHaus! I was so surprised at how much easier that spring-loaded base made my espresso-prep in the morning. Even my son enjoys helping me and using the tamper. The tamper is heavy-duty and a great quality. It has made all the difference, and I no longer use the tamper that came with our Breville!
customer_reviews.author: Alisha

customer_reviews.title: Tool creates the ideal espresso.
customer_reviews.text: Works so well to create the perfect cup of double espresso. Pairs nicely with the quality of our Rancilio Espresso machine. Arrived in beautiful and high quality packaging!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This works well. One less thing to worry about when dialing in the grind.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: no better than ordinary tamper
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping to get consistent crema for each cup. I still have to tamp just as much and with as much force as with my other tamper.
customer_reviews.author: Flagler Jan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for Breville 54mm
customer_reviews.text: Delivered promptly and works as described. Packaging was very impressive and professional. This 53mm tamper is a perfect fit for our Breville 54mm filter basket. Consistent tamp for a perfect espresso. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Tonij958

customer_reviews.title: More novelty than utility
customer_reviews.text: The calibration on this tamper doesn't seem to be spot on, and it isn't terribly convient to test such levels of pressure. Isn't that why you get a calibrated tamper? It makes a good espresso pick, but it seems to be a bit of a novelty. I would stick with a classic solid-metal tamper.
customer_reviews.author: Lumpy

customer_reviews.title: very nice tamper without huge price mark up
customer_reviews.text: The tamper I received has the LuxHaus engraved (not like the reviewer stated that it came without), it is heavy and feels solid, if not having this tamper, I would not realize that the tamper comes with my Breville is a “toy”. In addition, it is nicely cliberated which helps me to realize that how had I wrongly tampped the coffee before.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewPal

customer_reviews.title: Love it!  Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well to provide consistency to the tamp of the coffee grinds. Simply slowly push down until you feel it bottom out, and then stop pushing. The action is smooth and the tamper is solidly built and feels heavy in your hand. The handle is also machined metal, not plastic, which was a surprise to me (maybe I did not read the product info carefully enough). It is nicer than I was expecting; would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: E. Mumpower

customer_reviews.title: Great tamper for the money
customer_reviews.text: I thought I would have to spend upwards of 100.00 to get a good tamper but this one is the bomb! The difference in my espresso is easy to recognize. I'm feeling like a Barrista.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great pressure tamper for training baristas!
customer_reviews.text: It is sturdy, ergonomic and a great tool for learning what pressure to use when tamping coffee
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Surpassed my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made and elegant. The perfect size for my 51mm portafilter, and takes the guess work out of tamping. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jihn L. Rice

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Well built, looks nice and does the job. I am new to espresso, before this i had to try hard to get it right.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kermanshahi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for a 54mm cup and solid with tampering
customer_reviews.text: The tamper works really well and the grounds are coming out consistently as pucks when hit against the knock box. Wipe down with paper towel after each use and it stays looking sharp! Impressed with it so much, I bought a second one for my son to use with his machine and he is very happy now!!! Thanks again.
customer_reviews.author: Attilio F.

customer_reviews.title: High quality tamper
customer_reviews.text: The build quality on this is solid. The packaging was even really well done and I like the pouch that comes with the tamper. It’s calibrated perfectly to help me get the perfect espresso. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: MAF

customer_reviews.title: Handmade but you can hardly tell
customer_reviews.text: Tamper came the exact size requested. Looks sleek and professional, nearly factory manufactured, but was surprised to see it's a small business building products by hand. Handle is flawless, and the head shows very minor blemishes in the stainless that don't detract from the quality of the tamp at all. 10 out of 10, love the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tamper
customer_reviews.text: I am pretty happy with this tamper. With the coffee and the grind size I use. I make a full and a half press to achieve a good enough pressure and it has been consistent for about 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Emi Reru Yan

customer_reviews.title: Its a great, heavy, and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Its a perfect fit for our 51mm portafilter, and tamps to close to 30lbs. Definitely helped dial in our shots. Super heavy, it fits great in my hand, and the top fits well in my palm to apply even pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Frank E. Tackitt

customer_reviews.title: According to him it made OK coffee really good. He said his first attempt produced almost 1/2 ...
customer_reviews.text: This was Christmas present for a friend. According to him it made OK coffee really good. He said his first attempt produced almost 1/2 crema. on an inexpensive machine. When I first received the unit, I thought it was too big for his machine, boy was I wrong. It fit like a glove. He is extremely impressed with this tool. Thank you Lux Haus.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Joseph Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Made all the difference!
customer_reviews.text: Nice heavy weight tamper. Made all the difference in getting my extraction in the proper range on my Breville machine. Realized I needed to put a little more muscle into it. Since using this over the attached Breville tamper I'm in the espresso range every time. Has really helped a newbie!
customer_reviews.author: Robert I.

customer_reviews.title: Chipped tamper
customer_reviews.text: The tamper is chipped as shown in the picture. It's tamps fine, but the chipped part makes me rather unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Avimanyu Datta

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazed at quality of this product. Whenever pulling a shot I constantly catch myself looking at it. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chiara

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly to consistently tamp down coffee grounds for making espresso.
customer_reviews.author: PKR

customer_reviews.title: Quality unit!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. Great feel, tight, no play in the handle. Smooth mechanism. Good weight. Great value! Nice storage bag. Can't go wrong with this unit, and did I mention, it is a great value for the money? Very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Floyd Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Makes quite a bit of difference
customer_reviews.text: I didn't believe having a constant press of the coffee made a difference, until I bought this. If you have an espresso machine, and don't have an automatic tap, you should get a calibrated tap like this. It will make a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Odom

customer_reviews.title: Does its job well.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Also feels great in your hand. Has definitely helped improve my shots at home.
customer_reviews.author: Sir Awesome

customer_reviews.title: Check the size!!!
customer_reviews.text: Check the size of your espresso maker to see if the 53mm is the right size - this was too big for ours!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased with quality
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the packaging and quality. I never knew how hard you were supposed to push down to get a good tamp. Working well for several months now.
customer_reviews.author: Chris&Lauren

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: So long as your using for intended purposes and not what you would think to use it for by its looks it works great. Not even kidding... my mom saw it and asked why the hell a butt plug was on the kitchen counter...🤦‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, consistent and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Grinds eapresso down great. Worth it to have the fresh ground beans. I wish the handle was a little larger to hold on to.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for great coffee.
customer_reviews.text: The workmanship is great. Works well as intended. It’s my daily tamper and my new favorite.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Consistent tamps, great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: Tamper: Great look and feel, gives you a consistent tamp every time. Customer Service: I mistakenly ordered the wrong size tamper for my espresso machine, I reached out directly to LuxHaus and they immediately got an exchange for the right size shipped out. Very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Construction seems solid, spring came calibrated to the range promised. Tamping is now 100% consistent, so that's one less variable to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Nice calibrated tamper
customer_reviews.text: Very nice calibrated expresso tamper. I like the feel and mass of it.
customer_reviews.author: Edward J McKernan

customer_reviews.title: Love ease of use and the price.
customer_reviews.text: Just learning how to make coffee, this great for me in being consistent in tampering.
customer_reviews.author: HoopHous

customer_reviews.title: I should have bought this sooner!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great addition to my Breville Barista Express. This works much better than the tamper that comes with the machine because you don't have to guess how much pressure you need to use to tamp the coffee. The size fit perfectly and no more incorrect tamps.
customer_reviews.author: Doogerman

customer_reviews.title: The need I never realized I needed.
customer_reviews.text: The balance and Handle of the unit is wonderful and smooth. Though I haven’t thrown it at a brick wall or shot it from a wrist rocket yet; the sturdiness is solid and feels like good engineering. For the consistency delivered and the price I compared to the taste it delivers it is a steal of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: levi guthmiller

customer_reviews.title: Super high quality for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! Super high quality and easy on the hands! If you’re looking for an affordable calibrated tamper, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: ezepeda05

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but I think the spring is too rigid.
customer_reviews.text: I think it's a little too strong. Haven't measured it on a bathroom scale, but I think it's more compaction than necessary.
customer_reviews.author: chrischan

customer_reviews.title: Better espresso!
customer_reviews.text: My espresso has got better since I've been using this tamper.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen  Saxe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent well made and works as described. I do find it has made a difference in my espresso. More consistent favor and strength.
customer_reviews.author: JTS

customer_reviews.title: Great tamper
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent tamper and the self calibrating feature makes all the difference. Well made, works very well, handsome, feels good in the hand. Another reviewer mentioned the logo on the side of the tamper as negatively affecting the tamping process. That is quite inaccurate as the coffee does not come in contact with that part of the tamper at all.
customer_reviews.author: John Kingood

customer_reviews.title: Learn to Tamp like a pro
customer_reviews.text: This helped me learn the correct pressure for tamping with my espresso machine. The Breville Barista.
customer_reviews.author: TFD

customer_reviews.title: Good Tamper
customer_reviews.text: Feels solid. Fit and finish overall very good. Made dialing in my espresso shot much easier because I tamp repeatedly the same. I cannot speak on its durability as I have not had this unit very long.
customer_reviews.author: John Zakis

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy AF
customer_reviews.text: Its sturdy. It presses the espresso ground down super well. And it looks pretty. 10/10 will probably buy a second one because why the f*** not.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia G.

product_meta.title: LuxHaus 58mm Calibrated Pressure Tamper for Coffee and Espresso
feature_bullets: YOUR ESPRESSO WILL TASTE BETTER - For perfectionists who demand the best possible tasting espresso shot - our calibrated tamper ensures you get a 100% PERFECT TAMP EVERY TIME. The tamper is pressure sensitive - when fully compressed, the coffee grounds in the portafilter are compacted with consistent pressure every time - the perfect tamp for the best tasting espresso possible.

FOOD SAFE STAINLESS STEEL - Your health is our #1 priority. Rest assured that you are getting your money's worth here. We use the highest quality, food-safe 100% stainless steel for our tampers' base with no coating. Don't buy other cheaper tampers as they may flake off metal pieces into your grounds when tamping. Your well-being is too important to risk it.

SAVE TIME AND MONEY - Step up to by far the highest quality tamper available anywhere at this price point. You will never need to buy another tamper again, and will save time, money and frustration. Once you taste the rich aroma of smoothly tamped espresso from your own machine you will forget about your local coffee shop and prefer to make your own.

IMPRESS YOUR FRIENDS - The elegant red velvet pouch makes the LuxHaus tamper an ideal gift for any coffee enthusiast and home barista looking to get the most out of her espresso machine. It also doubles up as great place to store your tamper, fitting nicely into your drawer and keeping it well protected or looking great right on your counter-top.

PLEASE MEASURE YOUR COFFEE FILTER BEFORE ORDERING! - To ensure the best experience, we recommend that you measure your coffee filter by following our tamper sizing guide to size your tamper perfectly. We are so confident that you will love our espresso tamper set that we are offering all customers a lifetime satisfaction guarantee. If at any point you decide you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, just drop us an email and we will refund 100% of the money.
